videos.title: THE LINE
videos.description:
Lady Dior is an architectural construction.
Its beauty lies, at the beginning, on its “lines”,
its proportions and ideal dimensions.
The line creates the shape...
In all it takes 144 separate parts to make each Lady Dior.

The shape gives live to the material.

videos.title: THE MATERIAL
videos.description:
The leather must be perfect.
It all begins with the selection which must meet specially demanding criteria, always following the same ritual : touching, examining, seeing...
The craftman’s hands and eyes are trained to detect the minor flaw.

The leather is then cut, following the patterns.
After the canning stitching, the parts are ready to create the volume.

videos.title: THE VOLUME
videos.description:
Lady Dior is assembled around a wooden form.
The task is is an especially difficult one, as the canning has to align perfectly.

The front, back and sides are reinforced to guaranty that the bag will maintain its shape, preventing it from buckling.

videos.title: THE DETAIL
videos.description:
Metalwork strengthen and accessorize the bag: charms, zipper, grommets or base studs...
This is the Dior signature, making each detail an indespensable part of the beauty of the whole.

Lady Dior carries within it the very spirit of Dior...
